snippet: Daniel Loeb, the activist hedge fund manager of Third Point, has developed a reputation for aggressive tactics. He is unafraid to take big positions in companies and demand change in very public ways.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Loeb, the activist hedge fund manager of Third Point, has developed a reputation for aggressive tactics. He is unafraid to take big positions in companies and demand change in very public ways.

headline.main: Timeline: The Playbook of an Activist Hedge Fund Manager
